Москва не сразу строилась: Moscow wasn't built in a day.
Все за одного - один за всех: All for one and one for all.
He was running away from a wolf, and fell upon a bear.
Со своим самоваром в Тулу не ездят: You don't go to Tula with your own samovar (Coals to Newcastle).
Silence is a sign of agreement.
Repetition is the mother of learning.
Live for a century, learn for a century.
Measure out seven times, cut once.
От плохого семени не жди хорошего племен: From poor seed don't expect a good breed.
Задним умом дела не поправишь: You can't put the matter right with hindsight
You won't get far on another's horse.
The devil is not as terrible as he is painted.
Forge the iron while it's hot.
Ласковое слово слаще мёда: a kind word is sweeter than honey.
Утро вечера мудренее: Morning is wiser than evening (better sleep on it)
В гостях хорошо, а дома лучше: It's nice visiting, but home is better.
Тише едешь - дальше будешь: Slow and steady wins the race.
осенняя муха больнее кусает: The autumn fly bites more painfully.
The further into the forest, the more the firewood.
Не говори, что делал, говори, что сделал: Don't say what you've been doing, say what you've done.
The cat senses whose meat it has eaten.
Wisdom is in the head, not in the beard.
Every sandpiper is a giant in its own marsh.
Not all is gold that glitters.
He who doesn't work, doesn't eat.
On a thief the cap burns. (It's easy to see who did it).
(If they) chop down the forest the chips fly.
(he) sees beyond the forest, but not under his nose.
As you will sow? so will you also reap.
Your tongue will get you to Kiev.
A barking dog bites more rarely.
For one who has become hungry taste doesn't matter.
You can't catch up lost time.
Don't rejoice having found something, don't grieve having lost something.
If you want peace, prepare for war.
Делу время, а потехе час: All the time in the world for work, but only an hour for fun.
И солнце не без пятен: Even the sun is not without spots.
Ешь калачи, пока горячи!: Eat the rolls while they are hot.
There's no smoke without a fire.
За двумя зайцами погонишься - ни одного: Chase after two hares and you won't catch one.
